title: Todo App
description: A distraction-free web app to help you focus on creating and completing tasks. Built using streamlit.
goal: Goal: To gain familiarity with the streamlit library and use it to develop python web applications.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A website built entirely in Python to showcase coding projects and apps.
goal: Goal: Use knowledge learned to showcase my learned skills and abilities with networking and python.

title: FlashCards
description: A flashcard app built in Python. Minimal functionality built in. MVC design pattern used with Tkinter as the GUI.
goal: Goal: Practice working with csv data using the Pandas module.

title: Password Manager
description: A password manager built in Python. Support password generation and login search and lookup. MVC and Tkinter.
goal: Goal: Learn data structures and manipulation using the pandas module, reading from and saving to files.
